description.full: Xbox owners around the globe can experience the magic of the 13th annual Bonnaroo music and arts festival with a live concert destination on Xbox Live Friday, June 13 through Sunday, June 15, 2014.    With the Bonnaroo app, fans can enjoy live music like never before, with a virtual experience featuring the best performances, multiple stages, biggest artists and amazing SuperJams, and explore this year’s lineup to see the best of Bonnaroo’s past with exclusive performances
description.short: Xbox owners can experience the magic of the 13th annual Bonnaroo music and arts festival with a live concert destination on Xbox Live, June 13 through June 15, 2014.
